column1: Al-Qutayfah (Arabic: القطيفة‎) is a city in Syria
column2: administratively belonging to the Rif Dimashq Governorate
column3: capital of the al-Qutayfah District. It is located approximately 40 kilometers (25 mi) east of Damascus. According to the Syria Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS)
column5: 671 in the 2004 census. Its inhabitants are predominantly Sunni Muslims.
